description:
If I try to run "nova-manage instance foo", I get:

$ sudo -u nova nova-manage instance foo
instance matched multiple options:
	instance_type
	instance
title: 'instance_type' subcommand in nova-manage masks 'instance' subcmd

comments.content:
If I try to run "nova-manage instance foo", I get:

$ sudo -u nova nova-manage instance foo
instance matched multiple options:
	instance_type
	instance
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: "instance" and "vm" should probably be folded into one.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
